body.name: Android 13 Tablet with Keyboard, 2024 Newest 10 Inch 2 in 1 Tablet, 8GB RAM+128GB ROM/1TB Expandable Tablet PC, Quad-Core 2.0GHz CPU 10" HD Screen, 2.4G/5G WiFi 6 BT 5.0 Tableta with Case Mouse Stylus
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 5 hrs 28 mins
features: 【The Latest Android 13 tablet】The Android 13 tablet runs on the latest version of the Android 13.0 operating system. It offers a user-friendly interface and access to a wide range of apps from the Google Play Store, such as Netflix, YouTube, TikTok, Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, Disney+, etc.

【8GB RAM+128GB ROM+1TB Expand】The Android tablet 10 inch is equipped with 8GB RAM(Contain 4GB Extended Memory) for smooth multitasking and efficient performance. It also has 128GB ROM storage for storing your apps, files, and media. Micro SD card slot provides up to 1TB of expandable memory, giving you unlimited options (card not included)

【2.4G/5G WiFi 6+6000mAh】The Android tablet lets you enjoy lightning-fast Internet speeds with 5G WiFi connectivity. It makes it easy to stay connected on the go, providing a more convenient experience for entertainment, browsing, gaming and shopping. It also comes with an 6000mAh battery that lasts up to 10 hours on a single charge, perfect for long-distance commuting and travel.

【Portable 2 in 1 Tablet】The 10 inch tablet has a professional work mode. With a keyboard and mouse that allows you to seamlessly switch between tablet and laptop mode. The tablet case ensures the tablet stays safe from scratches and bumps. It is an ideal device whether it is for work, study or play, Good gift for colleagues, students, writers, and business people.

【1 Year Warranty】 The android 13 tablet comes with a 1-year warranty and lifetime customer service, we will answer your questions within 24 hours. The package includes: 1 x 10.1 inch Tablet, 1 x keyboard, 1 x mouse, 1 x stylus, 1 x protective case, 1 x protective film, 1 x USB charger, 1 x USB-C cable, 1 x OTG.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mil is very pleased
reviews.reviewText: Mt mil needed a new tablet to play games on and didn't want to spend a lot. This one works great. It has plenty of storage, holds a charge great, and keeps her happy after several months still.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy with this product.
reviews.reviewText: I love that everything came together for me to use it. Stylish and durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy setup & user friendly
reviews.reviewText: Great price for this tablet. Lots of storage/capacity. Loved the keyboard & wireless mouse. Super easy setup with clear instructions. No complaints on my end at this time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Good for simple stuff, Not great for anything serious *update*
reviews.reviewText: I bought 3 of these for my kids to complete school work on and they work pretty well for that but I would definitely spend the same amount on just a tablet if it is better in the future.Pros:- good price for what it is.- works like any other android device with the same apps- allows my kids to complete their school assignments all at once instead of waiting for a chromebook to be free.- durable. As a mom to 3 7-10 year olds I am impressed.- congress with a stylus that helps keep the screen clean.Cons:- the keyboard and mouse are very flimsy and somehow interfere with the internet even though they are bluetooth.- won't charge on most usb-c cables. I think I've found 1 charger that did anything but it was super slow.- usb-c cable is flimsy and will snap off in the port with proper use. I am down to 1 charger out of 3. I am the only one who connects and disconnects the chargers.- charges slowly. It takes forever to charge to a full battery and the battery doesn't last very long if you are working on it most of the day.- they show the case holding up the tablet but that doesn't work very well.- slow. It takes forever to load apps that are very quick on any other device.- the screen protector it comes with results in needing to tap the screen much harder than without it. My younger two get extremely frustrated with how hard they have to tap. It does work better with the stylus.- the screen/protector are definitely not fingerprint resistant. By the time I got them set up they were covered in fingerprints despite my clean hands.Overall I give it a 3/5, I will be replacing these with laptops because I really don't see them lasting more than a year or two.UpdateEvery one of these has stopped charging. The keyboards and mice no longer work at all. I am very disappointed with this purchase, I should have just bought better tablets to start with. Save your money or be prepared to replace these within a few months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright screen, easy to use and synch with my pixel 6 phone.
reviews.reviewText: I use this for online college papers.Clear bright screen, works well, not as fast as a laptop but for $74.99 it is perfect budget wise and portability when flying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good tablet for the price! Update!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Love this tablet and the pretty pink color. Works well, good sound but.... battery runs out faster than any tablet, phone or laptop I've ever owned, and it takes a long time to recharge. I would not buy this one again but look for something of better quality.Update: 7 weeks later and after only watching a movie on this tablet it no longer connects to the internet. Tried all the troubleshooting tips, factory reset after some difficulties and no way will it connect to the internet. Really disappointed that Amazon only has a 30 day return/refund policy. Can't get a replacement or refund. Makes me angry that these are still being sold after so many complaints and nothing being done. I'm a senior on a limited income and purchased this as a replacement for my older tablet which probably won't last much longer. Update: I was finally able to get this connected to the Internet but it keeps losing the signal and none of my other electronics have this problem. The keyboard and mouse will no longer connect even though they did at first. Someone else had this tablet before me, they're name was still to be found in the system. Didn't see that at first and bingo it popped up after trying to get this thing working for 2 days. Obviously this was a return and never got wiped properly. I paid for a new tablet not a used one. Well I finally got this to connect to the Internet but only for one day! Won't connect again despite trying everything. Really fed up with this useless tablet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Muy buena tablet, de buena calidad, excelente para las tareas de los niños. Felicidades que sigan así

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente, solo que la pila le dura 4 horas solamente y eso que solo veo videos.
